title: Bound [DVD]
creator_credit: Larry Wachowski, Andy Wachowski, Stuart Boros, Andrew Lazar and De Laurentiis Entertainment Group
brief_description: A stylish and sexy noir thriller directed by the Wachowski Brothers. Corky (Gina Gershon) has just finished a stint in the slammer, and has been hired to renovate the apartment next door to Caeser (Joe Pantoliano), and his vampish girlfriend, Violet (Jennifer Tilly). Violet pursues Corky and they have an affair, which leads to them plotting to steal two million dollars of stashed Mafia money currently in Caeser’s custody. Can they pull off this daring theft, or will an unexpected twist in their otherwise flawless plan lead to their downfall?
